name: dicewerx
description: Standard dice notation parser and evaluator, written in TypeScript

scripts.test-with-coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && type ./coverage/lcov.info | codacy-coverage --username codemastermick --projectName dicewerx
scripts.publish:docs: git add . && git commit -m "chore: regenerate docs [ci skip]" && git push
scripts.prep: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.publish: npm run upload && npm run publish:docs

author: Mick Evans <codemastermick@gmail.com> (https://github.com/codemastermick)
